course.title: ADM 3323 Market Research (3 units)
course.desc: Review of exploratory, descriptive, and causal research methods such as interviews and focus groups, surveys, and experiments. Topics include: sample selection, the gathering, analysis and interpretation of market-related data, study of multivariate data analysis techniques, investigation of relevant applied market research topics.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: ADM 2304, ADM 2320.
